file_content.text: The Force is with you--now and always.
Master Orgus?
His power is growing. Only you can stop him. You must go to Tatooine.
Stop who? Why Tatooine?
I don't understand.
I've learned better than to argue with the voices of the dead.
As you wish, Master.
Leave me alone, old man. I've dealt with enough dead Jedi for one day.
Get off my ship.
A starship crashed in a desert canyon. Use the Force. Find it....
Who were you talking to? The holocom's not even on.
My old master reached out to me through the Force. He spoke to me, just like the Jedi Exile did.
It was Master Orgus.
Not a social call, then. What did Master Orgus say to you?
There's a crashed starship in a canyon on Tatooine. I can almost see it in my head.
We're going to Tatooine.
Then hold that thought. Next stop, Tatooine....
I'm still deciphering everything, but I know Tatooine's important.
It's complicated.
Then let's lay in a course for it and find out why....
You don't need to know the details. Just follow my lead.
Let me handle this.
I always do. Lead on, then....
Must have been your imagination. I wasn't talking to anyone.
You're hearing things.
Caught you practicing a speech, huh? Planning to run for Supreme Chancellor?
Political careers = against Jedi Code
Don't follow me around. Stay in your quarters unless I need you.
Were you spying on me?
I was worried saving the Republic would make you all soft and cuddly. What a relief.
Jedi = fighting too much // Vacation = recommended
Ready to go when you are. I assume you have a destination in mind?
Lay in a course for Tatooine.
Tatooine.
Not what I was hoping to hear, but all right....
All I know is, I'm done with this place.
Anywhere but here.
Finally, something we agree on....
Where we go is my business.
Stop asking questions.
War zones really make you cranky....
I saw Darth Angral kill you. They found your body in space.
This can't be. You're dead.
I don't know what you are, but leave me alone.
Get off my ship.
This is crazy, but Master Orgus was standing right there. He spoke to me.
It was Master Orgus.
Master Orgus = alive? // T7 = happy!
He's not alive like that, Teeseven. Master Kiwiiks once told me powerful Jedi can live on through the Force after they die.
What I saw wasn't alive--but I could feel the Force flowing through it.
That explains it.
It's comforting to know death doesn't have to be the end. Makes all that risking our lives a little easier to bear.
I don't remember anyone teaching us how to do that on Tython.
I'd like to know that trick.
Guess we should've spent more time in the library.
As if he didn't order me around enough when he was alive....
And annoy the living?
